reason: Business class not allowed for flights under 6 hours.
context: Connecting flight to Boston via Chicago. Business class upgrade requested due to 8-hour total travel time and need to work during flight for client presentation.
Direct flight to Boston. Economy class within policy limits. Early morning departure allows for full day of meetings upon arrival.
Afternoon departure allows for morning meetings in SF. Arrives in Boston in time for dinner and next-day meetings.
JetBlue's Economy Plus offers extra legroom and priority boarding. Direct flight with good on-time performance record. Includes free WiFi for productivity during flight.

reason: International flight over 8 hours - business class approved
context: Overnight flight to London for European client meetings. Business class necessary for 11-hour flight duration and arrival readiness for same-day meetings.

reason: International return flight over 8 hours - business class approved
context: Return flight from Frankfurt after European client meetings. Business class allows for work during 11-hour flight and arrival readiness for next-day presentation.
